channel.title: Best Books To Get
channel.description:
Hey guys! I need the best books to get for these things:
Javascript SQL PHP CSS HTML C++ Java iPod Web Development iPod App Development And anything else you guys think I should get!
Thanks guys!

item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

Yeah, the dummies books are really great, I have just bought a few.

item.title: Best Books To Get
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:8, topic:424025”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=526675.msg3836965#msg3836965 date=1322961922]

HTML/PHP for dummies is great, i learned a lot about website development from that book . .

This is surprisngly correct.
Read the _____ for Dummies and you’ll probably get some basic knowledge which you can build of off.
[/quote]I was looking at those today in at Barnes & Nobles and they looked pretty good just wasn’t sure if I wanted to spend the money on em or what.[/quote]
It wont get you to the mastery level, but it indeed will start you off.
[/quote]
I was also looking at these kinds kinds of books too:

Read full topic
